QuestData.Title: Burn the Bodies
QuestData.Description: You don't understand. Anythin' these plant people don't infest they fatten up and then turn inta mulch.$b$bI say we take out their food source.$b$bThese botani got a few corpses lying around that I saw. Might be a good idea to burn those bodies.$b$bLet's find out if they can infest ash.
QuestData.CompletionText: If I survive this, I'm gonna get even by becomin' a vegetarian.
QuestData.RewardText: Normally I'm not a violent dwarf, but I ain't about to sit by and get turned into a bush. And I ain't about to let others do the same.
